en-US.summary: A collection of transformational and faith-inspiring Christian podcasts.
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask Edifi Podcasts to play featured episodes
Alexa, tell Edifi Podcasts to see recommended channels list
en-US.name: Edifi Podcasts
en-US.description:
"The earth shall be full of the knowledge of the Lord as the waters cover the sea." (Isaiah 11:9)  

Are you looking for transformational and faith-inspiring Christian podcasts? Enable the Edifi Podcasts Skill — a truly powerful skill that brings together thousands of the best Christian podcasts in one place for your listening enjoyment.

Edifi Podcasts is filled with the best Christian podcasts — safe content that will edify and inspire your faith. With the Edifi Podcasts Skill, you can easily listen to the latest episodes featured on Edifi along with popular channels. You can also quickly search for new podcasts by channel or topic, and discover phenomenal, new Christian podcasts in the process. 

HOW DOES IT WORK?
Just talk to Edifi Podcasts Skill. We'll have featured episodes and recommended channels if you’re not sure which podcasts to listen to. Or search channels or episodes by keywords when you want to listen to a specific podcast.

You can say...
-Alexa, open Edifi Podcasts
-Alexa, tell Edifi Podcasts to play featured episodes
-Alexa, tell Edifi Podcasts to list recommended channels
-Alexa, ask Edifi Podcasts for my playlist
-Alexa, tell Edifi Podcasts to search channels
-Alexa, tell Edifi Podcasts to search for episodes about 'Jesus loves me'
